Blog.post: The day started going to ZhongHua for an art camp 4 a day...very interesting...and lots of gals...haizzz...dont know wat to say bout them also. The day very tiring say, from morning till afternoon....today also very 'dao mei' cause kana suan by a sec 1 girl from bartley sec...haiz...nv respect seniors say...mus complain ...sometimes mus be more gracious let it b...mayb she still in her own wonderland..i think tats bout it 4 the day...warping it up wit a friendship Proverbs---Love is blind. Friendship tries not to notice...

Started the day gong to NP...then Leonard request for early dismissal cause he wanted to go ST. GABRIEL'S PRIMARY SCHOOL for the carnival. I followed suit.The school really old, really wonder how the students study there.After tat ...went home watch TV. At nite, went out wit parent 4 dinner...i guess tat is the end of my first blog

2day so sian man from yesterday on must go for a series of art tink, going different places, doing different kind of art...prefer going ZhongHua for the Art camp man...tat one nicer...2day really notink to say due to large amount of time spent at the Bradell Heights' CC for the ART...

Today's urlLink promotion urlLink test damn shiok man, no other urlLink training so tough before...ya...the SIRs every urlLink time give chance one but 2day they damn strict man ...i like it...hope they can do tat on every urlLink training ...luckily i pass say or else dont know how...heard tat they will pass everyone ...good luck to those who heaven get their result...hahax

This morning went to Pierce for a jog wit parents...Then grab breakfast @ ANG MO KIO...The whole afternoon is very plain notink special...In e evening my mother went to do some charite...went out wit father for dinner...haiz...notink special...Yesterday went to the temple and i saw a very familar face, i think she is in the same group as me in ATC camp from Cedar Secondary, Clara...haizzz

Long time nv write my blog liao...HaIz...2day, fed up with the english teacher, old hag , everytime also scold people no wonder everyone also hate her...HaHaZ...2day also shot at the air rifle range...suX...lousy actually...i guess i will stop now...2b continued 2ml...
2day so sian no training, stay at home the whole day...go tuition in the afternoon...dont even understand wat the teacher is teaching bout...sian.........troubled....
